title: [Lava Flows, Fumaroles]
description: Fumaroles along the northern ridge emit a constant cloud of noxious vapors and smoke.  Short of suicide, you can't think of a single reason to continue in that direction.

Fumaroles along the northern ridge emit a constant cloud of noxious, yellow vapors and opaque white smoke.  Even the layer of ash in that direction has been stained an unhealthy yellow, and, short of suicide, you can't think of a single reason to continue in that direction.
